bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Minimum Performance Characteristics of IEEE 802.20 Terminals and Base Stations/Access Nodes
IEEE Standard for Minimum Performance Characteristics of IEEE 802.20 Terminals and Base Stations/Access Nodes

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies minimum performance parameters and the associated test methodologies for implementation of IEEE 802.20 compliant systems.
This standard specifies minimum performance parameters and the associated test methodologies for implementation of IEEE 802.20 compliant systems.
